pesticide.PPE: Wear long sleeved shirt and long pants, socks plus shoes, chemical resistant gloves. Chemical-resistant materials include barrier laminate, butyl rubber, nitrile rubber, neoprene rubber, polyvinyl chloride, or viton.

Safety_Information.general_Info: Harmful if swallowed. Harmful if absorbed through the skin. Avoid contact with skin, eyes, or clothing.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Call a poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice. Have person sip a glass of water if able to swallow. Do not induce vomiting unless told to by a poison control center or doctor. Do not give anything to an unconscious person.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: Take off contaminated clothing. Rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15-20 minutes. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: In case of emergency call toll free the Bayer CropScience Emergency Response Telephone No. 1-800-334-7577.

Application_Info.units: fl oz per 100 lbs of seed pieces
Application_Info.max_product_per_acre_per_season: 0.143 lbs of active ingredient/A (65 g ai/A)
